title: Topic 007 Question 002
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure SQL server named SQL1. SQL1 contains an Azure SQL database named DB1.
You need to use Microsoft Defender for Cloud to complete a vulnerability assessment for DB1.
options: From Advanced Threat Protection types, select SQL injection vulnerability.
Configure the Send scan report to setting.
Set Periodic recurring scans to ON.
Enable the Microsoft Defender for SQL plan.
